required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: National Nurses Health Cohort Study (NNHS): a Web-based Ambispective Cohort Study in China
clinical_study.official_title: National Nurses Health Cohort Study (NNHS): a Web-based Ambispective Cohort Study in China

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the current study was to build an ambispective cohort study of female nurses, based on existing physical examination and nurse work schedule data and a web-based questionnaire system, focusing on the effects of occupational, environmental, and lifestyle risk factors on the health of Chinese women.

primary_outcome.description: psychophysical health related events will be collected by web-based questionnaire and hospital information system.
National Aeronautics and Space Administration Task Load Index was used to evaluate the mental workload every year.

secondary_outcome.description: Pittsburgh sleep quality index was used to evaluate the sleep quality every year.
Self developed perceived social support scale was used to evaluate the level of social support every year.

arm_group.description: Participants will be recruited from Peking University Third Hospital through cluster sampling. Female registered nurses, licensed practical nurses and/or midwives with informed consent are included in this study. The exclusion criteria are student nurses and training nurses.

intervention.description: It is an observational study, and no intervention will be provided.

study_pop.textblock: Participants will be recruited from Peking University Third Hospital through cluster sampling.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Female registered nurses, licensed practical nurses and/or midwives with informed consent are included in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
- student nurses
- training nurses
